name: Zombie Gunners- Last Alive
description: This game covers the shooting zombies where zombies are having the ability to shoot with guns. You have to be very smart shooter to kill the waves of countless zombies in the battle of last on survivor. Collect your survival asset searching through the battle ground and kill shot all the resurrected undead zombies as the advance to bite and attack you with the guns and rifles. Don’t get relaxed for single moment as the deadly shooter zombies will shoot you out in the meantime. Battle is about survival killing and shooting all the viral enemies. With snipers and modern weapons, you can kill one zombie with one shot so don’t forget to keep updating your weapons for long survival. We are sure you will enjoy the thrill of shooting the deadly creature in the town. Please suggest us for any further improvements. We are thankful.
